String.string: Evil must be eradicated. Kaia bless you, hero.

Eliminate Ebon Tower shamans and guards, arachnen painspinners, and anguish fiends in Ebon Tower. [You must select Ebon Tower (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Report to Kesarik in the cave near Ebon Tower.
